name: Asteroid Miner
short_description:
Your objective is to collect as many asteroids as possible and turn them into the station before the inevitable rash with one of the numerous probes that the station sends out.

Move your ship around with the arrow keys. As you get more money, your speed will increase. But the probes' speeds increase as well, at a faster rate than yours!

Scoring is determined by your money plus 5 for each asteroid in your cargo. For every asteroid turned in to the station, you get $10.
summary: Mine the asteroids that fly by your space station.
